title: Classic Golf Legends
description: Tee off on a journey through golf's golden era and test your knowledge of the legends who shaped the game!

questions.question: Arnold Palmer's huge, passionate following of fans was known by what affectionate name?
Jack Nicklaus holds the record for the most major championship victories with how many titles?
What was Jack Nicklaus's famous nickname?
Ben Hogan made a miraculous comeback to win the 1950 U.S. Open just 16 months after what event?
The Masters Tournament is played every April at which famous golf course in Georgia?
Arnold Palmer won the Masters Tournament how many times during the 1950s and 1960s?
Which golfer was known as 'The Merry Mex' and was famous for his charismatic personality on the course?
Sam Snead, known for his sweet swing, won the most PGA Tour events in history with how many victories?
The 'Big Three' of 1960s golf consisted of Arnold Palmer, Jack Nicklaus, and which other player?
Ben Hogan won three major championships in 1953 (Masters, U.S. Open, and British Open). Why didn't he complete the Grand Slam?
options: He was banned from the PGA
The PGA Championship overlapped with the British Open

questions.question: Which woman golfer dominated the LPGA in the 1950s and was one of the founding members of the tour?
Tom Watson won five Open Championships (British Open) and had a famous rivalry with which golfer throughout the late 1970s?
Jack Nicklaus won his record sixth Masters title in 1986 at what age, making it one of the most memorable moments in golf history?
Which South African golfer won nine major championships and was one of the 'Big Three' alongside Palmer and Nicklaus?
The Ryder Cup, a prestigious team competition between the U.S. and Europe, was originally between the U.S. and which country?
